HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: Tentatively updated for RimWorld 1.6. Please report any issues you find. Previous problems with log spam and GUI elements interfering with vanilla UI should be resolved. I removed the dependency for Fluffy's old colour picker mod and replaced it with the vanilla color picker, but it only allows predefined colors. For now the available colors are hard-coded. NOTE: Not all fixes/improvements have been backported to all older RimWorld versions!
